text:
For firms in Woden's industry, credit rating standards for an investment grade (Baa3/
BBB-) credit rating include a debt-to-EBITDA ratio less than 1.8x and a debt-to-capital
ratio (based on all sources of financing) less than 40%. On a conference call with analysts,
Woden’s management states that they believe Woden should be upgraded to investment
grade, based on its debt-to-EBITDA ratio of 1.5x and its debt-to-capital ratio of 34%.
